mapper.select: select * from v_ppmodel t1 where ppmodelid=#{id}

select * from v_ppmodel t1 where ppmodelid=#{id}

mapper.sql: SELECT t1.C1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C1PVPARTID, t1.C1PVPARTNAME, t1.C2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C2PVPARTID, t1.C2PVPARTNAME, t1.C3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C3PVPARTID, t1.C3PVPARTNAME, t1.C4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C4PVPARTID, t1.C4PVPARTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.L1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L1PVPARTID, t1.L1PVPARTNAME, t1.L2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L2PVPARTID, t1.L2PVPARTNAME, t1.L3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L3PVPARTID, t1.L3PVPARTNAME, t1.L4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L4PVPARTID, t1.L4PVPARTNAME, t1.OWNERID, t1.PORTALPAGEID, t1.PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PPMODEL, t1.PPMODELID, t1.PPMODELNAME, t1.PPMVERSION, t1.R1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R1PVPARTID, t1.R1PVPARTNAME, t1.R2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R2PVPARTID, t1.R2PVPARTNAME, t1.R3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R3PVPARTID, t1.R3PVPARTNAME, t1.R4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R4PVPARTID, t1.R4PVPARTNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPPMODEL t1

SELECT t1.`C1PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`C1PVPARTID`, t1.`C1PVPARTNAME`, t1.`C2PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`C2PVPARTID`, t1.`C2PVPARTNAME`, t1.`C3PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`C3PVPARTID`, t1.`C3PVPARTNAME`, t1.`C4PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`C4PVPARTID`, t1.`C4PVPARTNAME`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ISSYSTEM`, t1.`L1PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`L1PVPARTID`, t1.`L1PVPARTNAME`, t1.`L2PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`L2PVPARTID`, t1.`L2PVPARTNAME`, t1.`L3PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`L3PVPARTID`, t1.`L3PVPARTNAME`, t1.`L4PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`L4PVPARTID`, t1.`L4PVPARTNAME`, t1.`OWNERID`, t1.`PORTALPAGEID`, t1.`PORTALPAGENAME`, t1.`PPMODEL`, t1.`PPMODELID`, t1.`PPMODELNAME`, t1.`PPMVERSION`, t1.`R1PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`R1PVPARTID`, t1.`R1PVPARTNAME`, t1.`R2PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`R2PVPARTID`, t1.`R2PVPARTNAME`, t1.`R3PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`R3PVPARTID`, t1.`R3PVPARTNAME`, t1.`R4PVPARTCTRLID`, t1.`R4PVPARTID`, t1.`R4PVPARTNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SRFPPMODEL` t1

SELECT t1.C1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C1PVPARTID, t1.C1PVPARTNAME, t1.C2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C2PVPARTID, t1.C2PVPARTNAME, t1.C3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C3PVPARTID, t1.C3PVPARTNAME, t1.C4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C4PVPARTID, t1.C4PVPARTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.L1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L1PVPARTID, t1.L1PVPARTNAME, t1.L2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L2PVPARTID, t1.L2PVPARTNAME, t1.L3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L3PVPARTID, t1.L3PVPARTNAME, t1.L4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L4PVPARTID, t1.L4PVPARTNAME, t1.OWNERID, t1.PORTALPAGEID, t1.PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PPMODEL, t1.PPMODELID, t1.PPMODELNAME, t1.PPMVERSION, t1.R1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R1PVPARTID, t1.R1PVPARTNAME, t1.R2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R2PVPARTID, t1.R2PVPARTNAME, t1.R3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R3PVPARTID, t1.R3PVPARTNAME, t1.R4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R4PVPARTID, t1.R4PVPARTNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPPMODEL t1

SELECT t1.C1PVPARTCTRLID AS C1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C1PVPARTID AS C1PVPARTID, t1.C1PVPARTNAME AS C1PVPARTNAME, t1.C2PVPARTCTRLID AS C2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C2PVPARTID AS C2PVPARTID, t1.C2PVPARTNAME AS C2PVPARTNAME, t1.C3PVPARTCTRLID AS C3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C3PVPARTID AS C3PVPARTID, t1.C3PVPARTNAME AS C3PVPARTNAME, t1.C4PVPARTCTRLID AS C4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C4PVPARTID AS C4PVPARTID, t1.C4PVPARTNAME AS C4PVPARTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM AS ISSYSTEM, t1.L1PVPARTCTRLID AS L1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L1PVPARTID AS L1PVPARTID, t1.L1PVPARTNAME AS L1PVPARTNAME, t1.L2PVPARTCTRLID AS L2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L2PVPARTID AS L2PVPARTID, t1.L2PVPARTNAME AS L2PVPARTNAME, t1.L3PVPARTCTRLID AS L3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L3PVPARTID AS L3PVPARTID, t1.L3PVPARTNAME AS L3PVPARTNAME, t1.L4PVPARTCTRLID AS L4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L4PVPARTID AS L4PVPARTID, t1.L4PVPARTNAME AS L4PVPARTNAME, t1.OWNERID AS OWNERID, t1.PORTALPAGEID AS PORTALPAGEID, t1.PORTALPAGENAME AS PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PPMODEL AS PPMODEL, t1.PPMODELID AS PPMODELID, t1.PPMODELNAME AS PPMODELNAME, t1.PPMVERSION AS PPMVERSION, t1.R1PVPARTCTRLID AS R1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R1PVPARTID AS R1PVPARTID, t1.R1PVPARTNAME AS R1PVPARTNAME, t1.R2PVPARTCTRLID AS R2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R2PVPARTID AS R2PVPARTID, t1.R2PVPARTNAME AS R2PVPARTNAME, t1.R3PVPARTCTRLID AS R3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R3PVPARTID AS R3PVPARTID, t1.R3PVPARTNAME AS R3PVPARTNAME, t1.R4PVPARTCTRLID AS R4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R4PVPARTID AS R4PVPARTID, t1.R4PVPARTNAME AS R4PVPARTNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPPMODEL t1

SELECT t1.C1PVPARTCTRLID AS C1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C1PVPARTID AS C1PVPARTID, t1.C1PVPARTNAME AS C1PVPARTNAME, t1.C2PVPARTCTRLID AS C2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C2PVPARTID AS C2PVPARTID, t1.C2PVPARTNAME AS C2PVPARTNAME, t1.C3PVPARTCTRLID AS C3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C3PVPARTID AS C3PVPARTID, t1.C3PVPARTNAME AS C3PVPARTNAME, t1.C4PVPARTCTRLID AS C4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.C4PVPARTID AS C4PVPARTID, t1.C4PVPARTNAME AS C4PVPARTNAME, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM AS ISSYSTEM, t1.L1PVPARTCTRLID AS L1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L1PVPARTID AS L1PVPARTID, t1.L1PVPARTNAME AS L1PVPARTNAME, t1.L2PVPARTCTRLID AS L2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L2PVPARTID AS L2PVPARTID, t1.L2PVPARTNAME AS L2PVPARTNAME, t1.L3PVPARTCTRLID AS L3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L3PVPARTID AS L3PVPARTID, t1.L3PVPARTNAME AS L3PVPARTNAME, t1.L4PVPARTCTRLID AS L4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.L4PVPARTID AS L4PVPARTID, t1.L4PVPARTNAME AS L4PVPARTNAME, t1.OWNERID AS OWNERID, t1.PORTALPAGEID AS PORTALPAGEID, t1.PORTALPAGENAME AS PORTALPAGENAME, t1.PPMODEL AS PPMODEL, t1.PPMODELID AS PPMODELID, t1.PPMODELNAME AS PPMODELNAME, t1.PPMVERSION AS PPMVERSION, t1.R1PVPARTCTRLID AS R1PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R1PVPARTID AS R1PVPARTID, t1.R1PVPARTNAME AS R1PVPARTNAME, t1.R2PVPARTCTRLID AS R2PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R2PVPARTID AS R2PVPARTID, t1.R2PVPARTNAME AS R2PVPARTNAME, t1.R3PVPARTCTRLID AS R3PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R3PVPARTID AS R3PVPARTID, t1.R3PVPARTNAME AS R3PVPARTNAME, t1.R4PVPARTCTRLID AS R4PVPARTCTRLID, t1.R4PVPARTID AS R4PVPARTID, t1.R4PVPARTNAME AS R4PVPARTNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPPMODEL t1

SELECT t1.[C1PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[C1PVPARTID], t1.[C1PVPARTNAME], t1.[C2PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[C2PVPARTID], t1.[C2PVPARTNAME], t1.[C3PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[C3PVPARTID], t1.[C3PVPARTNAME], t1.[C4PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[C4PVPARTID], t1.[C4PVPARTNAME], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ISSYSTEM], t1.[L1PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[L1PVPARTID], t1.[L1PVPARTNAME], t1.[L2PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[L2PVPARTID], t1.[L2PVPARTNAME], t1.[L3PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[L3PVPARTID], t1.[L3PVPARTNAME], t1.[L4PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[L4PVPARTID], t1.[L4PVPARTNAME], t1.[OWNERID], t1.[PORTALPAGEID], t1.[PORTALPAGENAME], t1.[PPMODEL], t1.[PPMODELID], t1.[PPMODELNAME], t1.[PPMVERSION], t1.[R1PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[R1PVPARTID], t1.[R1PVPARTNAME], t1.[R2PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[R2PVPARTID], t1.[R2PVPARTNAME], t1.[R3PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[R3PVPARTID], t1.[R3PVPARTNAME], t1.[R4PVPARTCTRLID], t1.[R4PVPARTID], t1.[R4PVPARTNAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFPPMODEL] t1
